function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential correlation between activities and perceived restorativeness and well-being","Impact":"Inaccurate understanding of the impact of park activities on restorativeness and well-being","Mitigation":"Conducting further research to validate the correlation between activities and restorativeness","Technologies":"Research studies, data collection tools","People":"Green space visitors","Owner":"Research institutions, urban planners, park managers"},{"Description":"Correlation between connection to nature and perceived biodiversity, and gender with perceived safety","Impact":"Misinterpretation of the relationship between nature connection, biodiversity, and gender on perceived safety","Mitigation":"Conducting additional studies to validate the correlations and develop appropriate interventions","Technologies":"Data collection tools, surveys, statistical analysis","People":"Green space visitors, researchers, urban planners","Owner":"Research institutions, urban planners"},{"Description":"Impact of green space characteristics on human and animal health","Impact":"Potential conflicts and negative outcomes due to inadequate design and management of green spaces","Mitigation":"Integrating interdisciplinary research to understand and optimize green space characteristics for both human and animal health","Technologies":"Interdisciplinary research methods, environmental monitoring technologies","People":"Health professionals, wildlife conservationists, urban planners","Owner":"Environmental organizations, health institutions, urban planning authorities"}]}
